abstract: Lionsgate, the independent movie studio tipped as a potential bidder for Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer, intends to table an “aggressive” offer for Miramax, which was recently put on the block by the Walt Disney Company, The New York Post reported.

lead_paragraph: Lionsgate, the independent movie studio tipped as a potential bidder for Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer, intends to make an “aggressive” offer for Miramax, which was recently put up for sale by the Walt Disney Company, The New York Post reported, citing people inside or close to Lionsgate.
